thread.section_title: Chicago Airbrush Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chicago Airbrush Supply | www.chicagoairbrushsupply.com
thread.title: Vera Brasher
thread.title_full: Chicago Airbrush Supply reviewed by Vera Brasher

author: Vera Brasher
title: Vera Brasher
text: They will not answer their phone and won't return email messages. I paid extra for 2nd day FedEx but after a week have not received the order. I have a feeling that this company has gone under but is still taking people's money. My next step is to go to my bank and file a dispute, which I will do tomorrow. Very frustrating to have to fork out more money To get my supplies.
